depositERC20(uint256).notice: Allows the owner to deposit a pre-approved amount of ERC20 tokens.

depositEth().notice: Allows the owner to deposit ETH into this ETH-based savings account.

getBalance().notice: Gets the balance of this account. Can only be called by the owner or admin.

withdrawERC20(uint256,address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw ERC20 tokens. Charges a 3% fee if before the lock period ends.

withdrawETH(uint256,address).notice: Allows the owner to withdraw ETH. Charges a 3% fee if before the lock period ends.
